main_definition: Harrison can be a surname, the name of several places, or an idiomatic expression used in different contexts.

meanings_and_examples.example: Barbara Harrison is a common English female first name.
Harrison, Nebraska, USA is an unincorporated community in Saunders County.

place_name_examples.description: A city in the northeastern part of the state.
A county located on the western border of Ohio.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Idiomatic expression or phrase meaning to use a lot of force or energy
meanings_and_examples.example: He was harrisoning at the gym, lifting weights and running on the treadmill all day long.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A variation of the idiom 'to go hard'
meanings_and_examples.example: The team decided to harrison their best effort during the game.
